#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int test, n, val;
	cin>>test;
	for(int tell = 0 ;  tell < test ; tell++){
		cin>>n;
		vector<int> host;
		for(int i = 0 ; i < n ; i++){
			cin>>val;
			host.push_back(val);
		}
		sort(host.begin(), host.end());
		vector<int> res;
		for(int i = 0; i < n / 2; i++){
			cout<<host[n - i - 1]<<" ";
			cout<<host[i]<<" ";
		}
		if(n % 2 != 0){
			cout<<host[n/2];
		}
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
